Naomi Wanjiku Gakunga (a mụrụ n'afọ 1960), bụ onye mba Kenya na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe. E depụtara aha  ya maka Financial Times / Oppenheimer Funds Emerging Voices Awards na 2016 na 2017.
A mụrụ Gakunga na Gacharage, Kenya n'afọ 1960. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Nairobi na Kenya ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Design
Ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum California dị na Los Angeles.
Tupu ọ gawa United States ịga gụọ akwụkwọ di elu, Gakunga kụziri ihe na Mahadum  nke Nairobi
Ọ na-eji akwa tin, mpempe akwụkwọ metal na waya ígwè iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ na-adakwasị na  mgbidi
O gosipụtala ọrụ ya na US, UK, France, Brazil, Poland na Kenya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ndị o gosipụtara gụnyere; ihe ngosi nke afọ 2017 na October Gallery na London, Bihl Haus Arts na San Antonio, Frieze New York, Art Paris Art Fair, na Cape Town Art Fair
E gosipụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ ya Mũgogo - The Crossing na Royal Academy of Arts na London.
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na San Antonio, Texas.
